query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN metaDescription IS NULL OR metaDescription = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_meta, SUM(CASE WHEN excerpt IS NULL OR excerpt = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_excerpt FROM resources WHERE status = 'published'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, SUM(CASE WHEN metaDescription IS NULL OR metaDescription = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_meta, SUM(CASE WHEN excerpt IS NULL OR excerpt = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as missing_excerpt FROM resources WHERE status = 'published'
